title: FS: T205 Eddie Collins Mouth Open SGC 1.5 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Eddie Collins Mouth Open SGC 1.5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Nice looking card but accurately graded. New SGC slab but it does have a couple of scratches on the back of the slab, but not bad at all and they are on the left side of the back not near the card. The price is SOLD firm PayPal friends/family please. Thank you for looking.

Joe K
